products.name: Premium Turmeric Powder
products.description: Golden-yellow turmeric, freshly ground, directly sourced from Indian farms. High curcumin content (3-5%), perfect for culinary and medicinal uses.

farming.alt: Turmeric plants growing in organic farm fields with golden roots visible in soil
farming.description: Fresh turmeric plants in the field showing the characteristic broad leaves and rich soil where the golden roots develop.

processing.alt: Turmeric processing facility with washing, drying and grinding equipment
processing.description: Modern processing facility where turmeric roots are cleaned, dried, and ground into fine powder while maintaining quality standards.

final.alt: Premium turmeric powder in export packaging ready for shipment
final.description: High-quality turmeric powder packaged in export-ready containers with proper labeling and quality certifications.

extra.alt: Quality testing laboratory analyzing turmeric samples for curcumin content
extra.description: Laboratory quality control testing for curcumin content, purity, and microbiological safety of turmeric powder.

products.name: Black Pepper (Whole)
products.description: Premium Malabar black pepper with bold flavor and aroma. Hand-picked and sun-dried for maximum quality.

farming.alt: Black pepper vines growing on support poles in Kerala plantation
farming.description: Black pepper vines climbing on support poles in the lush Western Ghats of Kerala, showing green peppercorns ready for harvest.

processing.alt: Black pepper processing with sun-drying and cleaning equipment
processing.description: Traditional sun-drying process where green peppercorns are dried to become black pepper, followed by cleaning and sorting.

final.alt: Premium black pepper packed in export quality bags
final.description: High-grade whole black pepper sorted and packed in food-grade bags ready for international export.

extra.alt: Black pepper quality control testing for size and piperine content
extra.description: Quality testing laboratory checking black pepper for size grading, piperine content, and moisture levels.

products.name: Green Cardamom
products.description: Aromatic green cardamom pods from the Western Ghats. Premium grade with intense flavor.

farming.alt: Cardamom plants growing in shade under forest canopy
farming.description: Cardamom plants growing naturally under forest canopy in the Western Ghats, showing the ideal shade conditions for cultivation.

processing.alt: Cardamom pod processing and drying in traditional chambers
processing.description: Specialized drying chambers where fresh cardamom pods are carefully dried to maintain their green color and essential oils.

final.alt: Premium green cardamom pods packed for export
final.description: Premium grade green cardamom pods sorted by size and quality, packed in protective containers for export markets.

extra.alt: Cardamom essential oil testing for quality assurance
extra.description: Laboratory analysis of cardamom essential oil content and quality parameters to ensure premium grade classification.

products.name: Cumin Seeds
products.description: High-quality cumin seeds with strong aroma and flavor. Machine cleaned and sortex processed.

farming.alt: Cumin plants flowering in arid farmland
farming.description: Cumin plants with their characteristic small white flowers growing in the arid regions of Gujarat and Rajasthan.

processing.alt: Cumin seed cleaning and sorting machinery
processing.description: Modern cleaning and sorting equipment removing impurities and grading cumin seeds by size and quality.

final.alt: Clean cumin seeds ready for packaging and export
final.description: Premium quality cumin seeds after processing, showing uniform size and rich aroma ready for packaging.

extra.alt: Cumin quality testing for oil content and purity
extra.description: Laboratory testing of cumin seeds for essential oil content, moisture levels, and contamination analysis.

products.name: Red Chili Powder
products.description: Vibrant red chili powder with optimal heat and color. Made from premium Guntur chilies.

farming.alt: Red chili plants growing in Guntur fields
farming.description: Red chili plants in full growth in the famous Guntur region, known for producing the hottest chilies in India.

processing.alt: Chili drying and grinding process in modern facility
processing.description: Industrial grinding facility processing dried red chilies into fine powder while maintaining heat levels.

final.alt: Bright red chili powder in export packaging
final.description: Vibrant red chili powder with perfect color and heat balance, packed in moisture-proof export containers.

extra.alt: Scoville heat testing of chili powder samples
extra.description: Laboratory testing for Scoville heat units, color values, and capsaicin content in chili powder samples.

products.name: Coriander Seeds
products.description: Fresh coriander seeds with sweet, citrusy flavor. Machine cleaned and sorted.

farming.alt: Coriander plants with seed umbels in farm fields
farming.description: Mature coriander plants with seed umbels ready for harvest in the dry regions of Rajasthan.

processing.alt: Coriander seed threshing and cleaning operations
processing.description: Traditional threshing followed by modern cleaning to separate coriander seeds from chaff and impurities.

final.alt: Premium coriander seeds ready for export packaging
final.description: High-quality coriander seeds with uniform size and aromatic properties, ready for international markets.

extra.alt: Coriander seed oil content and quality analysis
extra.description: Laboratory analysis measuring essential oil content and flavor compounds in coriander seeds.

products.name: Basmati Rice (1121)
products.description: Premium long-grain Basmati rice with exceptional aroma and taste. Average grain length 8.35mm.

farming.alt: Basmati rice fields in Punjab with golden grain heads
farming.description: Premium Basmati rice fields in Punjab showing the characteristic long grains and aromatic varieties ready for harvest.

processing.alt: Modern rice milling facility with cleaning and sorting equipment
processing.description: State-of-the-art rice processing mill with paddy cleaning, hulling, and polishing machinery for premium Basmati.

final.alt: Premium 1121 Basmati rice packed for export
final.description: Long-grain 1121 Basmati rice showing excellent grain length and aroma, packed in export-quality bags.

extra.alt: Rice quality testing laboratory for grain analysis
extra.description: Quality control testing for grain length, aroma compounds, and cooking characteristics of Basmati rice.

products.name: Fox Nuts (Makhana)
products.description: Premium quality fox nuts (makhana) from Bihar lotus ponds. Hand-picked, roasted, and sorted for export quality.

farming.alt: Lotus ponds in Bihar where fox nuts are cultivated
farming.description: Natural lotus ponds in Bihar showing floating lotus leaves where fox nuts (makhana) seeds develop underwater.

processing.alt: Traditional makhana popping and roasting process
processing.description: Traditional roasting process where raw fox nut seeds are heated and popped to create the white, crunchy makhana.

final.alt: Premium white makhana packed for export
final.description: High-grade white makhana sorted by size and quality, packed in moisture-proof containers for international markets.

extra.alt: Nutritional analysis of makhana for protein and mineral content
extra.description: Laboratory testing of makhana for protein content, minerals, and nutritional value assessment.

products.name: Moringa Powder
products.description: Pure moringa leaf powder with high nutritional value. Drum-dried at low temperature to preserve nutrients.

farming.alt: Moringa trees with nutrient-rich leaves in farm plantation
farming.description: Moringa trees in organic plantation showing the characteristic compound leaves rich in vitamins and minerals.

processing.alt: Low-temperature drying and grinding of moringa leaves
processing.description: Specialized low-temperature drying process to preserve nutrients followed by fine grinding into powder.

final.alt: Green moringa powder in sealed packaging for export
final.description: Fine green moringa powder with retained nutritional value, packed in sealed containers for export.

extra.alt: Nutritional testing of moringa powder for vitamin content
extra.description: Laboratory analysis of moringa powder for vitamin A, C, calcium, iron, and protein content verification.

products.name: Organic Wheat
products.description: Premium organic wheat grains, perfect for flour milling. High protein content.

farming.alt: Organic wheat fields with golden grain heads ready for harvest
farming.description: Organic wheat fields in Madhya Pradesh showing golden grain heads without chemical pesticides or fertilizers.

processing.alt: Wheat cleaning and sorting facility with modern equipment
processing.description: Modern wheat processing facility with cleaning, grading, and quality sorting equipment for organic wheat.

final.alt: Premium organic wheat grains packed for export
final.description: High-quality organic wheat grains with excellent protein content, packed in certified organic bags.

extra.alt: Wheat quality testing for protein content and gluten strength
extra.description: Laboratory testing of wheat for protein content, gluten strength, and organic certification compliance.
